29000054.<voice 00001_29000054><start_lip_sync n0:

29000055.<voice 00002_29000055><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00002_29000055><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>No one I recognize. Not Raska, not

29000228.<voice 00000_29000228><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00000_29000228><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>I have a bad feeling about this.<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000231.<voice 00001_29000231><start_lip_sync n0:

29000240.<voice 00002_29000240><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00002_29000240><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>It's just the same.<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000242.<voice 00004_29000242><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00004_29000242><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>That said, isn't the fake junk made by

29000825.<voice 00005_29000825><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00005_29000825><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>But I don't think so anymore. If there

29000826.<voice 00006_29000826><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00006_29000826><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>Well, as usual, I can't see clearly,

29000827.<voice 00007_29000827><start_lip_sync n0:

29000828.<voice 00008_29000828><start_lip_sync n0:

29000058.<voice 00000_29000058><start_lip_sync n0:

29000059.<voice 00001_29000059><start_lip_sync n0:
